sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SECTION, in general, denotes a part of a divided thing, or the division itself. Such, particularly, are the subdivisions of a chapter, called also paragraphs and articles. The mark of a section is ยง.
S ection, in Geometry, denotes a side or surface of a body or figure cut off by another, or the place where lines, planes, and the like, cut each other.
